ai-tha-ap291:1.3_0: Having grabbed my hand, he took hold of my hand,
ai-tha-ap291:1.4_0: a great sage who attends on him.
ai-tha-ap291:2.2_0: Buddhas, the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap291:2.3_0: I attended on them with care.
ai-tha-ap291:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap291:3.4_0: or the fruition of the rainy season.
ai-tha-ap291:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap291:7.1_0: The Elders who were endowed with no support for the Elders,
